name: WaniKani Midnight Oil
description: Darker, less intense colors for WaniKani reviews so you can study at night (or during the day) with less eye strain.
additional_info:
The following variables are defined in the CSS so you can tweak the colors as needed: 

kpink: kanji background
kshadow: kanji shadow
rblue: radical background
rshadow: radical shadow
vpurp: vocabulary background
vshadow: vocabulary shadow
graytext: main text color

Just replace the hex values in the root section with the desired colors as needed.

This style was developed for Firefox v84.0.1 so some features might not work in other browsers.
